description: Mandate guardrail configuration for model deployments within your organization.

metadata.displayName: Effect
metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy.

metadata.displayName: Allowed Sexual Severities for Prompt
metadata.description: List of severities for sexual content on Prompt.

metadata.displayName: Allowed Sexual Enabled Configuration for Prompt
metadata.description: List of enabled values for sexual content on Prompt. Can be set to true, false, or both. True implies that content filtering must be Enabled, False implies that content filtering must be disabled, and setting both true and false implies that either setting is okay

metadata.displayName: Allowed Sexual Blocking Configuration for Prompt
metadata.description: List of blocking values for sexual content on Prompt. Can be set to true, false, or both. True implies that content filtering must be Blocking, False implies that content filtering must not be blocking, and setting both true and false implies that either setting is okay
